name: SHOWMAKER
description: Showmaker is an app that enables you to create top notch live stages with ease. With this app you can create a show in just 4 simple steps! Select a stage, Select a music, Select a 3D character and motion for it, and Select effects. Work with producers around the world to create the ultimate show!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 750 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Windows compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 1080 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Windows compatible
